cardPanel - Variable in class ZombiesGame.view.View
 
checkBoundaryCollisions() - Method in class ZombiesGame.model.Model
Checks if entities collide with boundaries, execute changes to their states if collision occurs (change their velocities or set them to inactive)
checkCollisions() - Method in class ZombiesGame.model.Model
checks collisions between every entity in the game makes appropriate changes to game states when collision occurs between specific entities (velocities, score, alive/dead state)
checkScoreInFile() - Method in class ZombiesGame.model.Model
reads the high score

collidesWith(Entity) - Method in class ZombiesGame.model.Player

controller - Static variable in class ZombiesGame.PewGame
 
Controller - Class in ZombiesGame.controller
The Controller classes connects the game by having direct communication to the model and the view.

Controller.CreateEnemyValve - Class in ZombiesGame.controller
One of the valves that the controller checks whether the message from the queue is from the class "CreateEnemyMessage"

One of the valves that the controller checks whether the message from the queue is from the class "CreateProjectileMessage"

Controller.UpdateEntitiesValve - Class in ZombiesGame.controller
One of the valves that the controller checks whether the message from the queue is from the class "UpdateEntitiesMessage"
createEnemy() - Method in class ZombiesGame.model.Model
creates a new enemy at a random position along the edge of the screen(left, right, top, or bottom border) adds to game, increments enemy counter
CreateEnemyMessage - Class in ZombiesGame.messages
The CreateEnemyMessage class is a message passed to the controller which tells the game to create an enemy
CreateEnemyMessage() - Constructor for class ZombiesGame.messages.CreateEnemyMessage
 
CreateEnemyValve() - Constructor for class ZombiesGame.controller.Controller.CreateEnemyValve
 
createNewGame(int, int, int) - Method in class ZombiesGame.model.Model
creates a new game/restarts game by resetting game state
createPlayer() - Method in class ZombiesGame.model.Model
creates a new player in the center of the screen, calculated using screen width, screen height, and pixel size adds to active game entities -> player always assumed to be at index 0 (first entity added)
createProjectile(Point) - Method in class ZombiesGame.model.Model
creates a new projectile at the position of the player calculates and sets a predefined trajectory using player and mouse position adds to active game entities
CreateProjectileMessage - Class in ZombiesGame.messages
The CreateProjectileMessage class is a message passed to the controller which tells the game to create a projectile
CreateProjectileMessage(Point) - Constructor for class ZombiesGame.messages.CreateProjectileMessage
Creates an instanc of the CreateProjectileMessage
